203.text:

209.text:

214.text:

219.text:

224.text:

following the lead of the first actor. The

229.text:

the correct answer or if he goes along with

235.text:

answer. In the first test the correct answer

241.text:

the second then said, "one" and the third

246.text:

who paused and with surprise and hesitancy

252.text:

said, "one". In the second test (with a different

258.text:

two. This time the first three actors said,

264.text:

the volunteer also said, "three", followed

267.text:
